comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: W. N. (William Nicholas) Ormsby, Class of 1916, played Left End (Number 2) for Brown University football, in this game against Cornell University, October 24, 1914 at the Polo Grounds (Brush Stadium) in New York. Cornell squeaked by defeated Brown 28 - 7. — [1] [2] Ormsby later was an Assistant Coach (football) at Boston College. He served in the Navy during World War I as Assistant Naval Attache, at the American Embassy, Madrid, Spain. [3] [4]

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Pixel Wrangler:  Thanks for the more complete info. for Ormsby.  We'll include some of it next time we update.
